import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const Details = () => { const [details, setDetails] = useState({category: '', title: '', cost: '', desc: '', section: [] }); const handleChange = (e) => { let name = e.target.name; let value = e.target.value setDetails({...details, [name]:value}) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(details) } return (
